properties.name: addRowGroupingCriteria
properties.description: Adds the field to the row grouping model.

properties.name: getGroupingCriteriaRows
properties.description:
Gets the rows of a grouping criteria.
Only contains the rows provided to the grid, not the rows automatically generated by it.

properties.name: removeRowGroupingCriteria
properties.description: Remove the field from the row grouping model.

properties.name: setRowGroupingCriteriaIndex
properties.description: Sets the grouping index of a grouping criteria.

properties.name: setRowGroupingModel
properties.description: Sets the columns to use as grouping criteria.
